attributes.action: Ban the Jagex Game Runescape - as it is addicting and has led people to suicide
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I call for the Jagex Online Game runescape to be banned in the UK. This game is highly addictive and people have actually died of starvation from playing for days on end. Also people have become so obsessed with the game that when they lose they have actually killed themselves and self harmed.

rejection.details: Please contact the Video Standards Council http://www.videostandards.org.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
